description: The OC120FM is ideal for entry-level consumers looking for a low-profile and easy-to-use large full motion mount. Full motion mounts give you the interaction you have always wanted when watching TV. Pan display left or right lets you view from multiple rooms or seating areas with a slight movement of the TV. Reducing glare is easy just tilt your TV forward or back to make viewing more pleasurable. The OC120FM is compatible with most 43 to 70 inch TVs on the market today and supports up to 120 lbs of weight. Take the guess work out of choosing your perfect mount! Tilt: plus 15-degrees to negative 1-degree. Mounting profile: 3.8-inches (9.7 cm). Maximum extension: 18.8-inches (47.8 cm). VESA compliance: 200x200 to 600x400.
title: OmniMount OC120FM Full Motion Mount for 43-Inch to 63-Inch Televisions
